Title: Thou Shalt Not Kill
Actors: Laurent Terzieff, Horst Frank, Mica Orlovic, Marijan Lovric
Plot: At the end of World War II, a French pacifist is arrested for refusing to fight. In prison, he befriends a German priest arrested for murder of a French Resistance fighter. They discuss morality, obedience, and religion.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
